name: Kicks and Sweeps
description: Develop powerful and deceptive kicks combined with low sweeps to control combat engagements.

cards.title: Meia Lua de Frente
cards.description: A half-moon kick that arcs across the opponent's body.
bulletpoints: Pivot on the standing foot for better rotation
Extend the leg smoothly to maintain control

cards.title: Rasteira (Leg Sweep)
cards.description: A low sweeping motion aimed at knocking an opponent off balance.
bulletpoints: Maintain a low center of gravity
Use hips to drive power into the sweep
Follow through with a return to standing position
